coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

[WhenUse] Gain 3 [LegStrength]

text.name: Swiftfeet Protection

[WhenUse] This Skill gains +1 Defense Level for every 10% HP this unit has cumulatively lost in this Encounter (max 6; based on max HP at the time of activation)
[WhenUse] Cannot be Staggered by damage until this Skill ends
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Protection] (once per turn)

1021201.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao] / Mao Branch Adept
1021201.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +2% more damage for every 1 Speed difference (max 10%)

Gain 1 [EnhanceZilu] every time an ally triggers a Deathrite effect (5 times per turn)
- If this unit triggered a Deathrite effect, gain 1 additional [EnhanceZilu]
When activating the [SupportProtect] effect, gain 5 [EnhanceZilu]

1021203.name: Tianjiu Star
1021203.desc: When [BurstZilu] Stack drops to 0 and expires, gain [BurstVulnerableZilu]

1021221.name: Blinkblade
1021221.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed inflicts [Burst] damage, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (3 times per turn)

main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:LegStrength} gives her 5 {status:Agility} every turn. All her skills gain more Power or damage based on speed and some get additional buffs at 10+ speed (S1, S3, S3-2 gain coin reuse, S3-2 guarantees a crit on all hits).
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him -5% damage received.

Standard Heishou Adept mechanic: Having her passive active lets her generate a resource that can be consumed upgrade her S3. She gets +1 {status:EnhanceZilu} when Deathrite effects are triggered (+2 if she triggered them) and +5 whenever her {status:SupportProtect} is triggered. She needs 10 stacks to use her S3-2. Having 10+ stacks also gives her 1 {status:Agility}.

Her defense skill gives her {status:SupportProtect}, redirecting an unopposed attack on an ally (excluding herself) to herself. At 10+ stacks of {status:EnhanceZilu}, she consumes 10 to use her S3-2 when redirecting an attack. Using this every turn is self-sufficient to always trigger her S3-2 once you hit 10 {status:EnhanceZilu} for the first time.
other: Inflicts {status:BurstAgility} with both versions of S3 and inflicts {status:BurstZilu} with S3-2. Deathrites trigger additional effects on the target whenever {status:Burst} is triggered with a certain condition, and deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on {status:Burst} when fully consumed. {status:BurstAgility} inflicts +1 {status:Burst} Count if the attacker had 10+ Speed, while {status:BurstZilu} inflicts 1 {status:Binding}. When {status:BurstZilu} is consumed, she inflicts {status:BurstVulnerableZilu} on that enemy, increasing damage taken from {keyword:Gluttony} or Deathrite effects. The application and consumption of these Deathrite effects on her S3-2 is what guarantees the self-sufficiency of her {status:SupportProtect} always triggering it.
